backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: dedicated page components with brand styling, React Router navigation integration, and image asset display configuration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the MOBIUS-NOVA landing page architecture with TanStack Router, brand styling, and page components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining the design system foundation.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Montserrat font from Google Fonts and mounting the React application to the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining routes for landing, about, technology, features, and contact pages with proper route tree structure.
Two-column benefits section displaying six value propositions with Nova Gold check icons, Cosmic Blue hover effects, and brand-styled cards.
frontend/src/components/CallToActionSect: Email signup CTA section with gradient background, input field with mail icon, and Nova Gold to Cosmic Blue gradient button.
Three-column grid showcasing six capability cards with icons, leading with Multi-Modal Single Core technology and using MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with brand logo, social media links (Facebook, X, LinkedIn, Instagram), navigation columns for Solutions and Company, and copyright information with privacy/terms links.
frontend/src/components/FounderExpertise: Section component displaying a call-to-action for pilot installation partners, emphasizing the pre-commercial prototype stage with decorative gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with MOBIUS-NOVA logo image, tagline, headline, CTA buttons, and animated scroll indicator with decorative floating background elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor, switching between authenticated and anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks when backend integration is needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors (liquid-silver, nova-gold, cosmic-blue, etc.) defined as CSS custom properties with utility classes and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page with hero section featuring background image, mission statement with Target/Lightbulb/Users icons, and company values in a card layout.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page component with a hero section featuring a header image, contact form with name/email/company/message fields, and form state management using React hooks.
frontend/src/pages/FeaturesPage.tsx: Features page showcasing MOBIUS-NOVA capabilities in a grid layout with icons, including multi-modal core, scalability, weather resilience, zero emissions, 24/7 power, cost effectiveness, smart monitoring, and minimal footprint.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page component that composes multiple sections (Hero, Features, Founder Expertise, Benefits, Call to Action, Footer) with a dark gradient background theme.
frontend/src/pages/TechnologyPage.tsx: Technology page explaining the multi-modal energy system with hero section, detailed breakdowns of wind and hydro energy capture mechanisms, and technical specifications using icon-based cards.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors (liquid-silver, nova-gold, cosmic-blue, etc.), Montserrat font family, container settings, and animation keyframes using OKLCH color space.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting MOBIUS-NOVA branding guidelines (full caps name, Montserrat font, color palette), architectural notes, required images for technology/about/contact pages, and feature implementation history.
